Burma: Thawun Gyi and Thawun Nge found Toungoo (Taungoo) as a frontier outpost
China: Battle of Yamen: A Yuan fleet destroyed a vastly superior Song force near Yamen. The Song chancellor Lu Xiufu drowned himself with Bing.
England: The Statute of Mortmain was issued.
Poland: Death of Bolesław V the Chaste
Spain: Siege of Algeciras (1278–79): A Marinid force destroyed the Castilian navy in port in the Bay of Gibraltar and captured and executed the soldiers besieging the city.
